section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on October 13, 2024.*
section.heading: Rules.
section.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, may issue rules to implement the provisions of this subchapter.
section.codify:annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of § 44-665.18, see § 5039 of Fiscal Year 2025 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2024 (D.C. Act 25-506, July 15, 2024, 71 DCR 8406).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 5039 of Fiscal Year 2025 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2024 (D.C. Act 25-506, July 15, 2024, 71 DCR 8406).
